website_summaries.verdict: The Fujifilm X-T100 is an absolutely gorgeous mirrorless camera with strong image quality and a reasonable price tag, so it's a shame its autofocus performance doesn't measure up.
cons: Touch not available for menu navigation
Raw capture not available at all ISOs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality camera
customer_reviews.text: A seriously awesome camera. Have been lucky enough to have had use of one of these for a while now whilst I await delivery and it doesn’t disappoint. Amazing picture clarity, plenty of functionality and great connectivity make it a quality piece of kit. Bluetooth connectivity means I can transfer photos to my phone in seconds and upload them to Instagram/Twitter within seconds. Have also been working on selfies and selecting 1 or more faces from the face recognition using the flip out screen which is awesome and easy to use for shots from any direction.
customer_reviews.author: Wezzo_04

customer_reviews.title: Lovely size camera.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this from Amazon BLACK VERSION WHICH JUST LOOKS. VERY SMART. CAMERA IS WELL MADE NOT TOO HEAVY. EASY TO USE. MY ONLY GRIPE IS THAT THE BUTTONS ON THE CONTROL ARE VERY EASILY TOUCHED. I TOOK A PHOT OF FLOWERS- But when going to review my shot. It wasn’t there. I must have deleted by mistake. Apart from this small problem I found the camera to do a great job. It’s Bayer but the colours are great as you would expect from FUJI. OVERALL VERY PLEASED WITH THE CAMERA. GOOD REDUCED PRICE TOO FROM AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: chips

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a camera for everyday use and previously I had been a bit of a Canon fan. A friend loaned me his to try out as he was really happy with it it. I wasn't disappointed. Image quality is superb, the adjustable viewfinder is a real bonus. It has all the features of a larger SLR but the convenience of compactness and light weight which is great for travel and general everyday purposes, which is what I was looking for. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr J Dilworth

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, nice retro style and great features
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an expert photographer and I was looking for a good camera to start learning and enjoy the photography. I've need suggested by a photographer this camera, as a good balance in between the classic reflex and a digital camera. Super lightweight and easy to carry, makes great pictures. Effectively as good as a reflex. It comes with a standard lens that can be replaced. Happy to had chosen it.
customer_reviews.author: Paride

customer_reviews.title: Do read the manual as they’ll be so many you’ll miss out on if you are a newbie like myself.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a new camera as our previous FUJIFILM camera was pretty dated. I don’t plenty of research and opted for this X-T 100. It hasn’t disappointed. It has many great features like using the app to transfer pictures instantly and face recognition self timer which means you don’t have to sprint to get in front of the camera. And has excellent picture quality. This camera will serve me and my family for many years. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing images
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's hard to find a camera with an aps c size sensor, evf and Fuji colours! This camera is one of may favourites. Menus pretty clear. Evf is excellent. And the film simulation modes are awesome. Especially classic chrome. You can charge from a mobile micro usb in camera. And it even comes with a hand grip ready to fit in the box. Very pleased. And at £349 unbeatable value.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. J. W. McBriarty

customer_reviews.title: Solid build, good image quality
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid and a lot of camera for the money. Suppringly heavy. Auto focus a bit sluggish (online reviews say the same) is the only negative I have. Far more portable than my SLR, not quite pocket size but easy enough to take everywhere with you. Unless you have need to the latest autofocus tech it's a great way into the system or a more practical everyday/travel camera
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a camera that was easy to use and provides professional quality photos. This camera fits the bill. Its light and un-obstructive when carrying it around with quick turn on and readiness to catch those moments as they happen which is all important for me for family memories. My daughter has loved the flip out screen for selfies and the ability to bluetooth straight to her phone for sharing. Highly recommended bit of kit!!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use and great results.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my camera, it's the first camera I've bought that's not 35mm! Always used a smart phone for photos however thought I'd look at a family friendly camera instead of upgrading my phone just for a better camera function! Great 4k video, easy to share photos to my phone with the app, loads of easy to use options and effects. The smooth quality feel of the flip out screen is perfect for taking selfies, really looking forward to using it over Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Not bad.lens is a bit plasticky but i bought a adapter ring to use mu nikon lenses. Only down side so far is battery life. So definitely going to get a power grip and a few batteries. Just need to work through everything now. Images seem pretty nice though although i havent seen an option to shoot raw yet?
customer_reviews.author: C. Price

customer_reviews.title: Top quality camera for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife as she was looking for a smaller and lighter mirrorless camera. She has always had Canon Cameras but she fancied this one and she absolutely loves it
customer_reviews.author: K. Szulc-krzyzanowska

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. I love taking pictures and this camera is really good quality! Does everything I need of it, and I love that I can transfer them straight to my phone with the app on my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh Crawforth

customer_reviews.title: Take it if you like both vlogging and good quality of pictures!
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing! The colours are very vibrant, still learning the settings, but they seem very simple. Love the size of it, love the shape. Whoever say it’s heavy... I cannot understand why would they need it to be lighter. Would be great to have it weather sealed though!
customer_reviews.author: IRENA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera for the price, was a choice between the canon m50 and this, I think this is better looking which tipped it. Only issues i have with it is the autofocus could be better and the kit lens is a power zoom which I don't love, seems to me that its just a bit of a waste of precious battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, high quality camera!
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use the manual setting but had a play around with the others and they're brilliant too! Great quality pictures and so easy to use. There is a fujifilm RAW viewer/editor software that you can download to your laptop and that's quite handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Happy buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good bluetooth connectivity -easy to transfer photos from camera to phone with android app.
customer_reviews.text: Went from a Nikon D100 to the fuji x-T100 as it is less bulky and lighter. takes excellent quality pictures and has good bluetooth connectivity with my smartphone with easy to use app.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: No regret
customer_reviews.text: Top quality photos, light weight, good neck trap. Wifi connection is unstable to copy pictures to phones.
customer_reviews.author: Hoa Khanh

customer_reviews.title: Fujifilm X-T100
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera few months ago, today I can say that it was worth for my usage! Quality in photo and video and good entry level performance. Small and easy to bring around. The delivery was greet, no problems at all! Nice purchase!
customer_reviews.author: matteo iannone

customer_reviews.title: Photography
customer_reviews.text: Great camera to begin with, quality of photos very good. This camera is suited for those who want to start photography, but not ideal if you want to do videography. However it is still good for videos but isn’t the best for it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bit of kit for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera, read the reviews and took the plunge. Have not regretted the decision.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gold is actually silver
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for the gold model - it is pewter silver and not even remotely gold, photos very misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Good image quality for the price and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Adam Szabo

customer_reviews.title: The worst manual I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: The camera is OK, but trying to work out how to use it is an absolute nightmare. The manual is nearly useless as it has no system about it and seems to have been shuffled like cards then glued together. There is no rhyme or reason about it. There is an index, but many of the terms only make sense to experts who can use the camera anyway. I have had mine three weeks and I am still working out what to do. More time should have been spent thinking about the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Young

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price but not stellar
customer_reviews.text: Pros: good sensor, the lens is very good optically, build quality, functionality, really like the touch screen. Cons: no hood, no charger, no hot shoe cover, power zoom is very annoying to use, autofocus in low light is worse than that on the old X-T1, small fiddly buttons, the electronic shutter is really slow (~1/5 sec vs 1/15 sec on the X-T1), no exposure compensation with auto ISO in the M mode. A bit of a disappointment after using the X-T1.
customer_reviews.author: Dr D

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE TO DATE.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has everything I need in a camera. The video and image quality is absolutely amazing in all lighting and the built flash is extra useful. The tilting screen allows me to capture High quality selfies and use the remote timer to capture precious moments with all of the family. Sending images straight to my phone through Bluetooth has never been easier and I am so glad I settled on this camera. A fantastic investment which I would highly recommend to those looking for something sensational without being too bulky or technical.
customer_reviews.author: Shamilla

customer_reviews.title: slow and buggy
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this camera, as can take some great photos, but had to return due to problems. I don't think these are unique to the camera I got, more to this model. The camera's auto-focus really struggles even in simple situations, and is very slow to lock on a target. I also had the camera freeze on me a couple of times and had to remove the battery to reset. Seems like the software and/or processor in this camera just isn't up to the task. Maybe the former can improve via firmware updates but the camera experience is sadly not on par with recent models from sony, canon, lumix or more expensive fuji ones.
customer_reviews.author: nachraing

product_meta.title: Fujifilm X-T100 Mirrorless Digital Camera, Dark Silver with Fujinon XC15-45mm Optical Image Stabilisation Power Zoom Lens kit
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Dark SilverSay hello to the FUJIFILM X-T100 retro styled, portable in size and built around a powerful 24-megapixel APS-C CMOS sensor, the FUJIFILM X-T100 mirror less digital camera is the ideal companion for creative everyday photography. Packed full of high spec features such as an advanced hybrid autofocus system able to keep pace with even the most active subjects, a speedy 6 fps continuous-shooting mode, high-resolution electronic view-finder and intuitive swivelling touchscreen, it brings professional image making into everyone’s grasp. Keep shooting all day with a battery life of 450 shots, make use of the pop-up flash to navigate tricky low-light situations. Get creative with videos, not only can the X-T100 produce breath-taking stills, but it’s great for video. With 4K recording and the option to capture footage in full HD at 100fps for super-slow-motion movies. Featuring an external microphone port means you can capture professional quality audio and with FUJIFILM’s film simulation modes you can add the finishing touches to your movies really look like the work of a pro, without the need for editing software. A variety of lenses to choose from The X-T100 is available with the XC15-45 mm F3.5-5.6 OIS PZ kit lens which is great for shooting a variety of subjects. Thanks to the camera’s X mount, you have the option to change lenses and can choose from 25 high-quality FUJINON lenses, so you can go ultra-wide for sweeping landscapes or try a telephoto lens to home in on distant objects. Shoot and share on the go boasting an ‘always on’ bluetooth connection, the X-T100 connects seamlessly with your smart devices via an in-built wi-fi connection to instantly transfer your images, so that you can upload and share them on social media, wherever you are. Download the free FUJIFILM camera remote app and get sharing. A colour to suit you available in three colour variations – dark Silver, black and champagne gold – there is an X-T100 to match everyone is sense of style.

BOX CONTAINS
X-T100 Dark Silver, XC15-45mm lens, Li-ion battery NP-W126S, AC power adapter, Plug Adapter, USB cable, Shoulder strap, Body cap, Owner's manual
feature_bullets: 4K movie recording. Operating Temperature is 0 - 40 degree Celsius
X-T100 dark silver, XC15-45 mm lens, Li-ion battery NP-W126S, AC power adapter, plug adapter, USB cable, shoulder strap, body cap, owners' manual

specifications.ISO Range: Standard Output Sensitivity : AUTO1 / AUTO2 / AUTO3
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars231 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
